name: SwordBlast
description:
SwordBlast is a fun to play game for kids.It is an action packed game with tones of enemies and also a final boss which is hard to defeat without using the nearby health boxes.

• Action • Adventure • Boss Fight • Fun Game • Game For Kids • Game With Boss

2D, indiegame, platformer, Platformer, action, swordblast, parkour, bossfight, gamesforkids, gamewithboss
